welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brooklyn Center, a charming city known for its diverse community and rich history. Get ready to immerse yourself in our unique culture and discover all that this vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore to your heart's content!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Crystal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves domestic flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Downtown Airport serves flights to and from countries outside of the United States.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
